name: appendable
description: AppendableDB is an append-only\*, schemaless, service-less, client-facing database.

scripts.warp: rm -rf dist examples/client/appendable.min.js examples/client/appendable.min.js.map examples/search/appendable.min.js examples/search/appendable.min.js.map && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=dist/appendable.min.js
